Text: Aaaagghh!
Huff...huff...!

First Child Karen, the Shooting Star...whose name,
too, has fallen to dust.

Your spear-handling skills you were so proud of are
in shambles... Though you still appear capable enough
to fend off the soldiers.
You bastard!
Any more pitiful resistance is meaningless.
Haaah!!!

Someone of your caliber should have figured that
out by now.

Your spear can't pierce me...for I am Sergey, the
Storm Sword!

Surely it must be fresh in your memory how I caught
you and gouged out your right eye!
Urgh...!

I'll admit I admire your fighting spirit, despite
your diseased right leg and the loss of your
right eye.

But your futile struggle is precisely that—a futile
struggle! Lament your fate and powerlessness
as you die!
We're going to help this Karen girl, Eta.
...Help her?
Yes, we're helping her! She's possessed, after all!

No matter who we're up against, neither the Shadow
Garden, nor Master Shadow, will abandon the possessed!
Wh-What? Did I say something strange?!
...Fine. I'll help capture her.
Well then, let's get to it—wait, "capture"?!

If, hypothetically, after she's healed, she was to
defy us as a pawn of the Cult...

Maybe I could get permission to use her...as a test
subject. If I can't get the dragon, I could at least
bring back an enemy possessed...

Seriously, Eta! I can't believe you're openly
expressing your ulterior motives for helping her!

I didn't say I would help her. I said I would capture
her. Ultimately, it's all the same.

What's the same is that your true motives are on full
display!

Anyway, Gamma, it's not like you're just helping out
of the goodness of your heart, either...right?

That possessed seems to know a lot about the Cult of
Diablos...

So you want to help her and acquire intel...
Isn't that right?
You're not wrong, but you're not right either!

In other words, I'm not right, but I'm also not
wrong. Heheh... So calculating, Gamma.
Hmph... The way you say it sounds so malicious!

You make it sound like I'm only driven by
self-interest for the Garden!
Isn't that...true?
Um, excuse me...?!

Heheh... Just remember to increase my budget when I
start experimenting on that possessed...
...Anyway, back me up! Time to intervene, Eta!
Fine...
Aghh!
Possession is a strange thing.

Even if you amputate the affected area, the sarcoma
instantly swells up, and the symptoms reappear!
Ha, ha, ha... It truly is a curse!
You call it a curse? Do you know nothing?!
You say I know nothing?

Of course I do! I know about the "Tears" and how
they're created!
Wh-What...?!

However! Knowing about it and sharing it with the
Round Table are two different matters!
Y-You bastard! So you've turned against the Cult—
Stop right there!
Huh?!
Who the hell are you?!
We lurk in the darkness and hunt down shadows...
We are the Shadow Garden!
